name: location_see_also_uris
description: Comma delimited list of URIs that can be accessed for additional information about the location

name: children
description: pipe delimited list of the subject monastic houses of the place. The name of the subject house is given.

name: alternate_location_names
description: Pipe delimited list of alternate names for the location of the place. Language code is given after the name in parenthesis

name: alternate_place_names
description: Pipe delimited list of alternate names for the place. Language code is given after the name in parenthesis

name: elevation
description: The WGS84 altitude of a spatial thing (decimal meters above the local reference ellipsoid)

name: rank_at_foundation
description: The rank of the place at its foundation

name: parent
description: The name of the monastic house's parent house

name: place_see_also_uris
description: Comma delimited list of URIs that can be accessed for additional information about the place

name: dedication
description: Person(s) to which the place is dedicated

name: location_category
description: Category of the location of the place. Valid values are 'associated_modern'

name: earliest_attestation_label
description: Label of the earliest attested mention of the place

name: earliest_attestation_max_year
description: Latest year of the earliest attested mention of the place

name: english_place_name
description: Name of place in english

name: place_references
description: Pipe delimited list of bibliographic references to the place

name: founders
description: Pipe delimited list of place's founders. Format is honorific prefix and name, followed by genderin parenthesis

name: type
description: Type of place. Valid value is 'monastery'

name: italian_place_name
description: Name of place in italian

name: longitude
description: The WGS84 longitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees)

name: comune
description: Comune that contains or is nearby the place's location

name: place_category
description: Category of the place as per the Getty AAT http://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/aat/

name: notes
description: Notes about the place

name: attestation_types
description: Types of attestation evidence known for the place

name: record_status
description: Status of the record about the place. Valid values are 'draft' and 'reviewed'

name: reign_of_earliest_attestation_label
description: Label of the reign that contains the earliest attested date

name: latitude
description: The WGS84 latitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees)

name: order
description: Monastic order of the place

name: positional_accuracy_assessment
description: Assessment of accuracy of place's location. Valid values are 'generic_handheld_gps'

name: seismic_class_id
description: Seismic classification as per http://www.protezionecivile.gov.it/jcms/en/classificazione.wp

name: gender
description: Gender of inhabitants of th`e place

name: earliest_attestation_min_year
description: Earliest year of the earliest attested mention of the place

name: historical_province
description: Historical province which contained the place

name: archaeological_remains
description: Are there remains on the site today? Defaults to 'unknown'

name: province
description: Province that contains the place's location
